hours_text:
## ABOUT US

Welcome to the Coral Springs Museum of Art, where creativity thrives, and contemporary art takes center stage! Since its founding in 1997, the Coral Springs Museum of Art has been a cultural beacon serving Broward, Palm Beach, and Miami-Dade Counties. Our mission is centered on showcasing a diverse range of artists, including nationally recognized figures and talented local artists from Florida. We celebrate artistic expression in its various forms, from cutting-edge exhibitions to thought-provoking installations, we are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of artistic expression. As a cornerstone of the Coral Springs cultural scene, we offer diverse programs and events for art enthusiasts of all backgrounds. We offer a wide range of classes, workshops, and events for preschoolers, youths, teens, and adults designed to allow people to get to know other art enthusiasts, display their art skills, and learn new ones along the way.

We invite you to step into our exhibition spaces, featuring an open layout and stunning views of our atrium. From thought-provoking exhibitions to immersive installations, our commitment to contemporary art is reflected in our ever-changing exhibitions, presented four times a year. Come in and experience the warmth and creativity that make the Coral Springs Museum of Art a true home for art lovers; admission is free!

[HISTORY](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105144813/https://coralspringsmuseum.org/about/mission-history/)

admission_text:
## GET INVOLVED

Whether it’s making a donation, sponsoring the museum, volunteering or joining the Coral Springs Artist Guild, there are lots of great ways to get involved and support the museum’s mission. 

[DONATE](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116181044/https://recreation.coralsprings.org/wbwsc/webtrac.wsc/donation.html?display=detail&module=PSS&type=MUSDONATION)

Coral Springs Museum of Art is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. A portion of your membership purchase may be tax-deductible to the extent of the law.

Search for:

#### CLICK BUTTONS FOR INFO

[](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116181044/https://coralspringsmuseum.org/coral-springs-artist-guild/)

## MEMBERSHIPS

Immerse yourself in the arts! Having a Museum Membership offers great value — all while supporting arts and culture in your community. Membership benefits include unlimited access to exhibits, invitations to exclusive previews and special events, and discounts on classes and programs. It’s a fun and enriching way for individuals and families to stay engaged year-round.

####  [ Annual Individual $75  ](javascript:void\(0\))

• Unlimited, year-round admission to the Coral Springs Museum of Art   
• Advanced notice of exhibitions, special events, and offers   
• First-look access to view exhibits before open to the public   
• Subscription to the Museum’s newsletter   
• Discount on all educational programming, including Museum classes, workshops, and camps   
• Exclusive deals on beverages at Museum...

## MISSION

To engage and connect our diverse communities with dynamic exhibits, exceptional art education, stimulating specialty programs, and inspired events to ignite cultural enrichment.

## CURRENT EXHIBIT

**The Coral Springs Museum of Art is pleased to announce our next exhibitions on view January 16 through February 21.**

_Underneath the Surface of Sight | Lisa MacNamara_  
**Main Gallery**  
Using paper, fiber, wire, fabric, photo transfers, and more, MacNamara will create visual experiences that bridge physical and emotional landscapes. Each piece reflects a body’s structure where emotions flow like currents beneath the skin.

_Casa Dolce Casa | Tommaso Fattovich_  
**East Gallery**  
Through bold abstraction, fragmented forms, and visceral textures, Fattovich will transform familiar feelings into emotional architecture, reflecting how “home” can be as much a state of mind as a physical place.

➡️ [RSVP FOR THE OPENING RECEPTION](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114153316/https://buff.ly/Vx0QAFU)
